name: Pixel Pro Golf
description:
Pixel Pro Golf is a wonderfully unique arcade golf game, that combines realistic physics with zen-like gameplay and beautiful pixel-art.

Play through 16 gorgeous pixelated courses, each carefully crafted with a unique style and conditions, as you try to become the best of the best.

Use the simple controls to aim, change club and swing. Then watch your ball head down stunning pixel fairways.

Play well to earn ranking points and rise up the world rankings, unlocking different tours until you reach the Majors and hit the top spot. 

Finish a tournament high enough to earn winnings, that you can use to upgrade everything from your driver to putter.

Challenge friends over Game Centre, with achievements and leaderboards for all the courses.

Can you become the number one Pixel Pro Golfer?

FEATURES:
16 unique courses
192 holes
Addictive, fun gameplay
Beautiful pixel-art
Equipment upgrades
Quick play
Relaxing audio
Game Centre leaderboards, achievements and challenges
